recipe.ingredients: - chicken breast (cooked and diced): 2 cups - mixed greens (spinach, arugula, lettuce): 4 cups - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - cucumber (sliced): 1 medium - red onion (thinly sliced): 1/4 cup - almonds (sliced): 1/4 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - apple cider vinegar: 2 tablespoons - Dijon mustard: 1 tablespoon - honey: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Ensure the chicken breast is cooked and cool. Chop or dice it into bite-sized pieces. Wash and dry mixed greens. Slice cucumber, chop cherry tomatoes, and thinly slice red onion. 2. Combine Salad: In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and chicken. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper until well blended. 4. Dress and Toss: Pour the dressing over the salad and gently toss until all ingredients are evenly coated. 5. Add Toppings: Sprinkle sliced almonds and crumbled feta cheese over the top of the salad. 6. Chill and Serve: Allow the salad to chill in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes before serving to enhance the flavors.
